Left thoracoscopy.context: Left thoracoscopy and left thoracotomy with declaudication and drainage of lung abscesses, and multiple biopsies of pleura and lung.

Left thoracotomy.context: Left thoracoscopy and left thoracotomy with declaudication and drainage of lung abscesses, and multiple biopsies of pleura and lung.

drainage of lung abscesses.context: Left thoracoscopy and left thoracotomy with declaudication and drainage of lung abscesses, and multiple biopsies of pleura and lung.

Empyema of the left chest.context: Preoperative Diagnoses: Empyema of the left chest and consolidation of the left lung.

consolidation of the left lung.context: Preoperative Diagnoses: Empyema of the left chest and consolidation of the left lung.

lung abscesses of the left upper lobe an.context: Postoperative Diagnoses: Empyema of the left chest, consolidation of the left lung, lung abscesses of the left upper lobe and left lower lobe.

respiratory symptoms.context: The patient has a complex history, which goes back about four months ago when she started having respiratory symptoms and one week ago she was admitted to another hospital with hemoptysis.

hemoptysis.context: The patient has a complex history, which goes back about four months ago when she started having respiratory symptoms and one week ago she was admitted to another hospital with hemoptysis.

marked consolidation of the left lung.context: She was found to have marked consolidation of the left lung with a questionable lung abscess or cavity with hydropneumothorax.

questionable lung abscess or cavity.context: She was found to have marked consolidation of the left lung with a questionable lung abscess or cavity with hydropneumothorax.

hydropneumothorax.context: She was found to have marked consolidation of the left lung with a questionable lung abscess or cavity with hydropneumothorax.

mild infiltrates of the right lung.context: There was also noted to be some mild infiltrates of the right lung.

30-year history of cigarette smoking.context: The patient had a 30-year history of cigarette smoking.

chest tube.context: A chest tube was placed at the other hospital, which produced some brownish fluid that had foul odor, actually what was thought to be a fecal-like odor.

brownish fluid with foul odor.context: A chest tube was placed at the other hospital, which produced some brownish fluid that had foul odor, actually what was thought to be a fecal-like odor.

abdominal CT scan.context: Then an abdominal CT scan was done, which did not suggest any communication of the bowel into the pleural cavity or any other significant abnormalities in the abdomen on the abdominal CT.

antibiotics.context: The patient was started on antibiotics and was then taken to the operating room, where there was to be a thoracoscopy performed.

flexible fiberoptic bronchoscopy.context: The patient had a flexible fiberoptic bronchoscopy that showed no endobronchial lesions, but there was bloody mucous in the left main stem bronchus and this was suctioned out.

bloody mucous in the left main stem bron.context: The patient had a flexible fiberoptic bronchoscopy that showed no endobronchial lesions, but there was bloody mucous in the left main stem bronchus and this was suctioned out.

erythema of the mucosa.context: Today, the double lumen tube was placed and there was some erythema of the mucosa noted in the airways in the bronchi and also remarkably bloody secretions were also noted.

bloody secretions.context: Today, the double lumen tube was placed and there was some erythema of the mucosa noted in the airways in the bronchi and also remarkably bloody secretions were also noted.

dense consolidation of the entire lung.context: Remarkable findings included a very dense consolidation of the entire lung such that it was very hard and firm throughout.

pockets of purulent material.context: There were many pockets of purulent material, which had a gray-white appearance to it.

whitish fibrotic fibrinous deposit on th.context: There was quite a bit of whitish fibrotic fibrinous deposit on the parietal pleura of the lung especially the upper lobe.

abscess about 3 cm in dimension.context: There seemed to be an abscess that was about 3 cm in dimension, all the lateral basilar segment of the lower lobe near the area where the chest tube was placed.

large cavity about 11 cm in dimension.context: The most remarkable finding was a large cavity, which was probably about 11 cm in dimension, containing grayish pus and also caseous-like material, it was thought to be perhaps necrotic lung tissue, perhaps a deposit related to tuberculosis in the cavity.

necrotic lung tissue.context: The most remarkable finding was a large cavity, which was probably about 11 cm in dimension, containing grayish pus and also caseous-like material, it was thought to be perhaps necrotic lung tissue, perhaps a deposit related to tuberculosis in the cavity.

dense adhesions.context: The apex of the lung was quite densely adhered to the parietal pleura there and the adhesions were quite thickened and firm.
